feed.title: The Ader Lab
feed.subtitle: A team of researchers at the Univeristy of North Carolina Greensboro investigating how cells build and maintain cellular compartments.

entry.title: Kaela & Curtis Win Munroe Grants!
entry.content: First two undergrads in the lab, Kaela and Curtis, have won Munroe grants to pursue their undergraduate research! Woohoo!
entry.summary: First two undergrads in the lab, Kaela and Curtis, have won Munroe grants to pursue their undergraduate research! Woohoo!

entry.title: Grand opening!
entry.content: The Ader Lab opens at UNCG! Welcome founding members, Charolette and Curtis!
entry.summary: The Ader Lab opens at UNCG! Welcome founding members, Charolette and Curtis!

entry.title: Coming soon…
entry.content: The Ader Lab will officially open at UNCG on August 1st, 2024! Thanks to Dr. Emma Carley for the design inspiration behind our logo!
entry.summary: The Ader Lab will officially open at UNCG on August 1st, 2024! Thanks to Dr. Emma Carley for the design inspiration behind our logo!
